mapper.select: SELECT u.*,f.flux FROM t_csp_user_info u LEFT JOIN t_csp_bind_info b ON b.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_csp_user_flux f ON f.user_id = u.id WHERE b.unique_id = #{uniqueId}

SELECT tu.avatar,tu.email,tu.nick_name,tu.mobile,tu.info,count(tc.id) AS pptCount, (SELECT count(ts.id) FROM t_csp_share ts WHERE ts.user_id = #{userId}) AS shareCount FROM t_csp_user_info tu LEFT JOIN t_audio_course tc ON tu.id = tc.csp_user_id AND tc.deleted = 0 AND tc.published = 1 AND guide != 1 WHERE tu.id = #{userId} GROUP BY tc.csp_user_id

SELECT tu.id,tu.expense,tu.expire_time,t.title AS meetName,tu.meeting_id AS courseId,tu.download_count,tl.replay_url FROM t_csp_user_flux_usage tu INNER JOIN t_audio_course t ON t.id = tu.meeting_id INNER JOIN t_csp_live tl ON tl.course_id=tu.meeting_id WHERE tu.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY tu.expense_time DESC

SELECT * FROM t_csp_user_info i WHERE 1 = 1
AND user_name = #{userName}

SELECT * FROM t_csp_user_info WHERE 1=1
AND user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')

SELECT * FROM t_csp_user_info i WHERE 1 = 1
AND mobile = #{mobile}
SELECT count(id) FROM t_csp_user_info WHERE abroad=#{location} and TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(register_time) = 1

SELECT * FROM t_csp_user_info i WHERE 1 = 1
AND email = #{userName}
select count(id) from t_csp_user_info WHERE abroad = #{location}

SELECT sum(weixin_count) AS weiXinCount,sum(weibo_count) AS weiBoCount,sum(facebook_count) AS facebookCount, sum(twitter_count) AS twitterCount,sum(yaya_count) AS yaYaCount, sum(mobile_count) AS mobileCount, sum(email_count) AS emailCount,
date_format(register_time,'%Y-%m-%d')as groupDate
date_format(register_time,'%Y-%u')as groupDate
date_format(register_time,'%Y-%m')as groupDate
CONCAT(YEAR(register_time),'_',QUARTER(register_time),'Q') as groupDate
date_format(register_time,'%Y')as groupDate
FROM t_report_register WHERE abroad=#{location} AND (register_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}) GROUP BY groupDate order by register_time
SELECT count(*) FROM t_csp_user_info WHERE province = #{name}

SELECT i.id AS uid,i.nick_name, p.package_id,i.register_time, p.package_start, p.package_end, p.source_type, temp.payMoneyUs, temp.create_time FROM t_csp_user_package p LEFT JOIN t_csp_user_info i ON i.id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id,COUNT(user_id) AS payTimes,create_time, SUM(CASE WHEN currency_type = 1 THEN should_pay END) AS payMoneyUs FROM `t_csp_package_order` WHERE state = 1 GROUP BY user_id) temp ON i.id = temp.user_id WHERE i.abroad = 1 AND temp.create_time BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND CURDATE()
